pli-tv-bu-vb-sk63:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk63:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū yānagatassa dhammaṃ desenti …
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk63:1.3: “Na yānagatassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk63:1.5: vayhaṃ ratho sakaṭaṃ sandamānikā sivikā pāṭaṅkī.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk63:1.7: Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca yānagatassa agilānassa dhammaṃ deseti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
